ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T19:12:37 [Issue ID 4000-47623] urn:comicvine:4000-47623 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 12:54:48. [Issue ID 64687]
ComicInfo.Summary: Overview Special Engineering Issue -- no, really! Amid mounting tension and worldwide danger, we focus on how the Shockrockets work, as Alejandro delves into the deepest recesses of Shockrockets base, learns the origin of the Shockrockets themselves and discovers a technological breakthrough that will have drastic and permanent repercussions for the entire Shockrockets program. Plus: Alejandro's family visits the base, more on the traitor in the Shockrockets' midst, and the Shockrockets put on an aerial exhibition that finds them giving aid of a sort they never expected. For regular readers, "Rocket Science" will pump up the intrigue and suspense, give them a look at how it all began, and build inexorably toward the final confrontation -- while for new readers, it's an ideal introduction to the team and how they work. And as with all Gorilla Comics, it's completely " New Reader Friendly ".
ComicInfo.Title: Rocket Science
